Plot: A semi-anthology series that centers on returning characters being terrorized by a serial killer in different locations, including a university and a hospital.
Title: Scream Queens
Writer: Ian Brennan, Brad Falchuk, Ryan Murphy
Actors: Emma Roberts, Lea Michele, Abigail Breslin, Keke Palmer
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 8 nominations.
